Posts.Content: My mother in law has been diagnosed with brest cancer. She is 82. She had her right breast removed and 21 lymph nodes this past month. This has happened very quickly as they say it is agressive. She has been told she will go for radiation for about 5 weeks. Can anyone tell me more. I live in Edmonton and she is in Winnipeg.
Posts.Title: Brest Cancer

Posts.Content: I guess what I am really asking is - is there a time line once you have been told the cancer is agressive? Also do you know if it is safe for her to drink the suppliment Ensure? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Brest Cancer
